channel.title: Flask on Brenda Thng
channel.description: Recent content in Flask on Brenda Thng

item.title: Product Analytics Dashboard
item.description: Task Using a Flask framework, I created a simple dashboard to analyse the product performance overtime. I made use of the Mixpanel API and access to the company’s database to retrieve and manipulate the data in order to create these charts. Some key charts include: Feature Audit Charts, Cohort Analysis Charts, Stickiness Ratio, Engagement Metrics Problems Faced 1. 2. 3. Lessons learnt 1. 2. 3.
